content:
This way, when you discover new creatures,
you can check their professional
identification and description anytime.

content:
<size=30>The eco-sphere... has achieved excellent composite environmental indicators...</size>
<size=30>It can settle even more... I'm certain... multiple species...</size>
<size=30>I formally request... Mr. Mobai! No matter what, I...</size>

content: Is that really all there is to it?!

content: Yep! I've learned about fishing from her.

content:

Hoho, hardly anyone can keep up with Sani when she runs.
Actually, she's investigating
the unusual fog in the surrounding waters.

content:
...Ho! It seems to be adapting well to the simple environment in the Ecoglobe...
I'll take some photos for the ecologists, maybe they can offer their support.

content:
Then, for the next step,

for the creatures needed in the eco-sphere!

content:
Using the insect net is simple.
When you get close to insects resting on trees or flying in the air,
click the <color=#38b6c5>left mouse button</color> to catch them.

content:
Please accept this <color=#8AAB4B>Wooden Insect Net</color> DIY Card.
Insects are an essential part of our ecosystem,
and I hope it brings you new joy.
